value.title: How to partition your data in Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Carey MacDonald stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about Azure Cosmos DB, a managed database service with unlimited horizontal scale, allowing you to scale storage and throughput independently. value.title: Introducing the Azure Data Box family | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mathew Dickson joins Donovan Brown to discuss the Data Box family of solutions to meet the challenge of moving data to the cloud. Azure Data Box offline devices help you transfer large amounts of data to Azure when the network isn't an option. Data Box online products act as network storage gateways

value.title: Multiple node pools in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) | Azure Friday

value.title: Operational best practices for web apps on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Service hosts millions of apps, serves trillions of requests per day, and has an SLA of 99.95%. But what should you do when your app has issues in production?
